original_title: SJB’s decision to annul party membership: Diana’s petition fixed for hearing
original_body_lines: The Expulsion Petition filed by Parliamentarian Diana Gamage challenging the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) for expelling her from the party membership was today fixed for argument by the Supreme Court.
The Supreme Court three-judge bench comprising of Justices Priyantha Jayawardena, Kumuduni Wickremasinghe and Achala Wengappuli fixed the petition to be heard on June 8.
In her petition, Gamage said she has been expelled from the party membership following her decision to vote in favour of the 20th Amendment to the Constitution.(Lakmal Sooriyagoda)
